00410         bool operator==(const CL_Mat4<Type> &other)
00411         {
00412                 for (int i=0; i<16; i++)
00413                         if (matrix[i] != other.matrix[i]) return false;
00414                 return true;
00415         }
00416 
00418         bool operator!=(const CL_Mat4<Type> &other) { return !((*this) == other); }
